NEW YORK , Oct. 21, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Avni Mahiji is on a mission to help people all over the world accumulate a well-rounded knowledge of the link between medications and healthy living, providing a much-needed service within the medical industry. As a Certified Pharmacist, Mahiji brings awareness to the connection between various medications and long-term health by educating patients on the benefits and potential risks of pharmaceuticals and homeopathic products. She has spent her entire career providing professional advice to patients on the benefits and risks of both prescription and over the counter items, assuring that medications are issued properly, assessing the risk of drug interactions, advising patients on making the most cost effective decisions, and regularly following up with them on their recovery and medication compliance. Dr. Mahiji also has continuous interaction with fellow physicians to optimize patient therapy. She is exceptionally knowledgeable on medications related to the treatment of anxiety, depression, anti-aging, heartburn, food allergies, and decongestants. Medications related to travel and sleep are also amongst the many health-related topics on which she is well-versed. Dr. Mahiji has also shared a wealth of wisdom as a columnist for Natural Awakenings ( New York edition) on the subjects of anti-aging and hair loss. 
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151021/279301 
"Not everyone is aware of the effects that prescription and over the counter medications have on our health," states Dr. Avni Mahiji , Certified Pharmacist. "I believe that anyone who enters a pharmacy should be equipped with all the knowledge that they need to make informed decisions about any medications or supplements that they are planning to use. The wellbeing of my patients is of the utmost importance to me, and I strive to keep them abreast of all important medical information in order to help them lead healthy lives." 
Committed to her role as both a pharmacist and health and wellness expert, Dr.Mahiji spends her time educating patients on the how's and why's of making healthy choices in everyday life. Over the course of three years she has embraced the opportunity to run a flu clinic, encouraging patients to protect themselves against various strains of the virus. She is also highly sought after by those looking to make lifestyle modifications that will help them lower blood sugar, blood pressure, and cholesterol. Dr.Mahiji's reputation for making patients feel comfortable and informed has gained her a great deal of esteem from her peers in the pharmaceutical industry. 
For more information on Avni Mahiji, please visit http://www.beautifulplanning.com , email or call 1.877.841.7244. 
About Avni Mahiji Dr. Avni Mahiji , a Certified Pharmacist boasting both beauty and brains, resides in New York City . The summa cum laude graduate of Boston's Massachusetts College of Pharmacy and Health Sciences has spent her entire career helping people maintain their health, and works to share her prescription and over the counter expertise worldwide. Mahiji's daily responsibilities include counseling patients on over the counter items, assuring that patients' medications are issued properly, checking for drug interactions, assisting patients with making cost effective decisions, and following up with patients on recovery and medication compliance. Dr. Mahiji aims to increase awareness of the connection between medications and overall wellness by educating patients about the benefits and potential risks of pharmaceuticals and homeopathic products. 
Alexandra Valdes
